titles: A breve cronycle of the Bysshope of Romes blessynge and of his prelates beneficiall and charitable rewardes. from the tyme of Kynge Heralde vnto this daye.
author: Gybson, Thomas, d. 1562.
publisher: By [R. Wyer for] Iohn Daye, dwellyng in Sepulchres parish at the signe of the Resurrection a lytle aboue Holbourne Conduite. Cum priuilegio regali, ad imprimendum solum,
notes: Actual printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
